subject: Re: RE: [junit] Re: signature mismatch
msgSnippet: yes i know this is simple ... but problems come if you use thread s run method from a class extending TestCase. if u have any confusion then plz. tell me. i ll
messageBody:
yes i know this is simple ... but problems come if you use
thread's run method from a class extending TestCase. if u have any
confusion then plz. tell me. i'll send u the sample code.
Sudipto

On Sat, 08 Jun 2002 Manuel Amago wrote :
> > differentiate juni's run method and thread's run methos ...
>
>Simple:
>THREAD => public void run();
>jUNIT (Test) => public void run(TestResult);
> TestCase => public TestResult run();
>
>Differences: return type, and parameter arguments.
>
>HTH,
>
>Manuel Amago.
>mailto:mamago@...
>
>
